name: Solitary Space Unit
description:
Made at GBC Jam #5 - Harvest

Travel infinite space destroying asteroids to collect fuel for your ship.

Keyboard controls:

UP/DOWN arrows - Forward/Backward thrusters

LEFT/RIGHT arrows - Left/Right roll axis

W/S keys - Forward/Backward yaw axis

A/D keys - Left/Right pitch axis

Mouse controls the cockpit camera

Space Bar - Fire torpedoes

P/ESC keys - Pause the game

GIT HUB LINK:

https://github.com/aytona/GBCGameJam_Harvest
